010package imagingbook.lib.filters;
011
012/**
013 * This class implements a 2D Gaussian filter by extending
014 * {@link LinearFilter2D}.
015 * 
016 * @author wilbur
017 * @version 2020/12/29
018 */
019public class GaussianFilter extends LinearFilter2D {
020
021        public GaussianFilter(double sigma) {
022                super(new GaussianKernel2D(sigma));
023        }
024        
025        public GaussianFilter(double sigmaX, double sigmaY) {
026                super(new GaussianKernel2D(sigmaX, sigmaY));
027        }
028        
029}
